attributes.action: I would happily pay more tax to save and improve our NHS.
attributes.background:
The NHS is crumbling under the pressure of continued budget cuts. Don't let the next generation grow up without it.
The NHS will last as long as there are folk left with faith to fight for it. A. Bevan.

rejection.details: This petition does not make a  specific proposal for Parliament or the Government to act on. We do have a petition on this subject which you may wish to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/178225. Alternatively, you may wish to start another petition setting out exactly what action you would like Parliament or the Government to take.
